definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: Broken glass and pipettes are "sharps". Dispose of them correctly too.
sentences.chinese: 弃置大件玻璃利器时，请通知当值职员协助妥善处理。

sentences.english: Please notify PTA immediately if you cannot perform the Parents on Duty due to schedule conflicts and any other problems.
sentences.chinese: 若预定值日时间无法当值，请立即告之家长会。

sentences.english: However, when the value changes, the binding does not appear to work.
sentences.chinese: 然而，当值的变化，似乎并不具有约束力的工作。

sentences.english: Ability to grasp , lift and carry or otherwise move packages , boxes and luggage up to 100lbs . continuously throughout shift .
sentences.chinese: 有一定负重能力，能在当值期间持续搬运行李和重物。

sentences.english: An exception to this rule is when a value is rounded down to zero.
sentences.chinese: 此规则的例外情况是当值向下舍入到零时。

definition: to keep goal/on duty as gatekeeper
variant of 執勤|执勤[zhi2 qin2]
to answer the roll call at 卯時|卯时[mao3 shi2], i.e. between 5 and 7 am/fig. to put in a conventional appearance
to abscond/to be absent without leave
(of a security guard etc) to be on duty, keeping an eye on things/to keep watch
to berate/to excoriate/to chide/also written 呵斥[he1 chi4]
to be furious/to fly into a terrible rage
